A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am heartbroken after seeing this movie\, and it's utterly disrespectful treatment of Luke Skywalker.  Every single choice for him was wrong.  And the movie delights in constantly subverting every single expectation\, as if that is clever.  It ignores mysteries setup in the previous movie\, diminishes the importance or several characters\, and has a multitude of plot holes. There isn't anywhere near enough space here to point out all the flaws of this movie.\nIt is simply a complete troll and slap in the face to long time Star Wars fans.
